Check out the `;stats` command to view detailed tournaments statistics, such as win rate, win streak and experience!
Want to know how you do compared to other people? Use the `;leaderboard` command to view your ranking in wins and experience!
Want to create your own tournament? Type `;create` in #bot-commands for more info!
You can use the `;info` command to view more information about a specific tournament!
Want to be sure you won't miss a tournament? Use `;reminder <tournament name>` to be reminded 10 minutes before that tournament starts!
